text: Merry Christmas foodtube I'm Charlie
from Jamie's food team here are my top

tip individual roasted vegetable bags
keeping them in these foil pouches
clears up so much space in your hob and
it's really gonna intensify the flavor
just get another sheet of foil right on
top of the other fold the edges so
they're nice and tight around the veg
sprouts and I've final package so there
we go three different veg three
different toppings stack them all up and
then you go loads of space easy as that
see what they're like they smell amazing
it saves on space saves washing up it
saves a long time let's give it a go my

first one

give it a good whiz
